name: Devour Dash: Survival of The Thickest
name_original: Devour Dash: Survival of The Thickest
description:
Controls 🢂 , D , 6 - Speed Up 🢀 , A , 4 - Slow Down 🢁 , W , 8 - Raise Head 🢃 , S , 2 - Menus Escape, 7 - Options Enter, 9 - Select F11 - Fullscreen Evolutions Description

Dash through the scenic desert and eat apples to evolve. Adjust your speed and height to dodge the dangerous spikes throughout the land that will knock the apples right out of your stomach. Evolve when you hit milestones and try to claim the Great Apple before another creature does. Can you collect all the apples?

Note: Runs best on Chrome.

Features
  • Three different sizes of apples, and lots of spikes to avoid.
  • 4 Stages of Evolution
  • 3 Endings
  • A special reward?
Development

This game was developed in Godot over the course of about a week for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 5 hosted by @phillip. I may push some more updates after ranking has been completed. Let me know what you think in the comments!

Programming/Art: @alkrssve

Music/Sounds: @Mild29

Trailer Video Editor: @MizuMiaw

Resources: Trix Sound Pack, SlothDevLlama Godot Starter
